name: Balloon Christmas Challenge
description:
The girl has lost her balloon and you must protect it through the challenges! There are 2 different game modes: Regular and Challenge mode. In the regular game mode you will face random challenges level by level. In Challenge mode you will face the same challenge until you can complete it. Complete the challenge and move on to the next challenge.

Through how many challenges will you be able to protect the balloon from? Many will try, and only few will beat all of the challenges!
